abstract: The Authors Guild is encouraging its 8,500 members to submit comments against the proposed settlement between the Department of Justice and three large publishers. The settlement, the guild argues, will only benefit Amazon.
snippet: The Authors Guild is encouraging its 8,500 members to submit comments against the proposed settlement between the Department of Justice and three large publishers. The settlement, the guild argues, will only benefit Amazon.
lead_paragraph: The Authors Guild on Monday urged its 8,500 members to protest the Department of Justice’s proposed settlement with three publishers, a proposal that clears the way for Amazon to lower prices on e-books.

headline.main: Attacking Amazon, Authors Group Urges Opposition to E-Book Settlement

abstract: The purchase of the 62-year-old publisher includes more than 3,000 back-list titles, Amazon said.
snippet: The purchase of the 62-year-old publisher includes more than 3,000 back-list titles, Amazon said.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com has expanded its publishing reach again by acquiring Avalon Books, a small, 62-year-old publisher that specializes in romance and mysteries.

headline.main: Amazon Buys Avalon Books, Publisher in Romance and Mysteries
